searchInput.agent_instructions: Enter the author's name or book title here to search for books.

searchButton.description: Button to submit the search query
searchButton.agent_instructions: Click this button to search for the books by the entered query.

selectBook.description: Selects the first book in the search results
selectBook.agent_instructions: Select the first book from the list that matches the search criteria.

addToCart.description: Adds the selected book to the shopping cart
addToCart.agent_instructions: Use this button to add the book to the shopping cart.

checkout.agent_instructions: Proceed to checkout after reviewing the cart.
